name: Mr. Grouch's Lawn Invasion HD
description:
Join Terrance, Thomas and Delina Mole in this Othello-style puzzle game that’s ideal for older kids as they learn spatial awareness, problem solving and develop rules-based understanding.

Mr. Grouch is retired and wants an easy life, but that doesn’t stop the local countryside moles from playing games and digging molehills — all over Mr. Grouch’s front lawn!

Mr. Grouch’s Lawn Invasion is a casual puzzle game with multiple game modes including campaign story mode, two-player, and more. Follow the main story with over 30 levels and journey along with Terrance and Thomas as they put a stop to naughty Daryl’s mole-bullying antics, or just play a one-shot game versus the AI.

Lawn Invasion offers a blend of Othello (“Reversi”) style board gaming, with tonnes of extras like Earthmines, fire crackers, dog treats (did we introduce Mr. Grouch’s dog, Bubbles, yet?), and more.

Strategy and intuitive gameplay combine in a game with more depth than at first glance.


Key game features:
- 30 levels of molehill digging fun, hiding from Mr. Grouch, running away from Bubbles the dog and much, much more.
- Play as Terrance or Thomas, and unlock Delina Mole and (eventually) naughty Daryl too!
- Adjustable difficulty settings Easy/Medium/Hard to scale game AI strength
- Nightmare game mode for the hardest challenge possible!
- Five different level themes with extra puzzles, shot clock timers, and other obstacles.
- Vibrant and colorful 3D animated characters and environment
- Unique composed music (HD features extra songs!)
- 16 Game Center Achievements
- Interactive game boards (tap the BBQ!)

HD game features:
- Made for Kids
- Additional music content
- Updated artwork
- No Ads, No Marketing
- No In-App Purchases
